upgradepath.description: Can pop 1 extra Bloon per shot.
Can pop 2 more bloons per shot.
Converts the Dart Monkey into a slower attacking Spike-o-pult that hurls large spiked balls. Each ball can pop lots of Bloons and rebounds off obstacles.
Hurls a giant spiked ball that pops lead and excels at crushing Ceramic and Fortified Bloons.
Gigantic spiked ball splits twice into 6 Juggernaut balls for even more destructive power against Ceramic, Fortified and Lead Bloons.
